activities: Collection, Processing, and Hosting of Electronically Stored Information (ESI) for use in litigation support services for law firms, corporations, and government agencies.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal Data Covered: off-line, on-line, manually processed data, human resources data
recoursemech: If for some reason a complaint is not satisfactorily addressed by Modus, the complainant should then contact BBB EU SAFE HARBOR, www.bbb.org/us/safe-harbor-complaints.  The EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) will be available to investigate unresolved complaints regarding human resources data.
